title: How to Make Plantain Chips

steps.headline: Peel the plantain.
steps.description: Using a sharp knife, cut off the top and bottom stem of the plantain then gently slide the knife down and remove the peel with your fingers.

steps.headline: Slice the plantain.
steps.description: With a sharp knife, chop the plantain into very thin slices, if it's too thick it won't turn into chips.

steps.headline: Season the plantain.
steps.description: Place plantain slices in a large bowl. Add olive oil, chipotle chili powder, smoked paprika, and sugar. Toss with hands until the seasonings are well incorporated.

steps.headline: Prepare cookie sheet.
steps.description: Lay some parchment onto the cookie sheet and place the plantain leaving room between them.

steps.headline: Bake the plantain chips for 16-20 minutes and flip after 8 minutes.
steps.description: Remove from oven when the edges begin to brown.

steps.headline: Wait for plantain chips to cool down and serve.
